name: St.Arc's
description:
An interactive fiction game about a girl, you, who fears the strength of her own want.

St. Arc's is about a young lesbian living in a surrealist world where upon graduation from school couples are paired up and turned into animals to live out their adult lives. St. Arc's is about said young lesbian choosing to change - into something unrecognizable to herself or to those around her.

- Experience having friends who care for you!
- Panic like a caged animal!
- Hold a girl's hand!
- Carry your trauma like an unhatched egg!
- Four distinct endings!

This game was created for SuNoFes 2021

It's not a very long game but I hope it's enjoyable nonetheless!
_______________
Tw: When speaking to your father he may become explosively angry depending on what you say. To avoid this, don't ask why you have to go school. Your character may also have panic attacks during points of stress.

Cw: Symbolic trauma memories, repression, conceptual forced marriage.

Credits: All writing and art done by me
